Articles.Content: Floor 806: Mr. Stay Puft walks by the window.
Floor 807: The prophecy... I made it up.
Floor 808: You suddenly feel like eating German Bacon
Floor 809: A room full of Portal's turrets. Goodbye.
Floor 810: A button that drops cubes on Floor 809's turrets.

Floor 811: A wormhole with a sign right in front of it saying,

Warp to Floor 1000

(Edge of the Observable Universe)

and you go through it.
Floor 812: Turns out it was a wormhole poster, You grab a coffee and head onward.

Floor 813: Daft Punk is playing at my house-floor.

Onward to floor 814!
Floor 814: The room where Google keeps Google Plus. DESTROY IT! DESTROY THE EVIL GOOGLE PLUS, BEING FORCE-FED TO US!
Floor 815: Infinity backups. IT IS TOO LATE.
Floor 816: Google has now taken over the Internet.

Floor 817: Joel messes around in the Sims 3 and makes this:

You then decide to take the stairs to the next floor.

My floor, do not require any number. choose the next yourself if you dare.

yup i m a fat world of warcraft fat demonist man as first caracters, but i played all to max level and more and shared backs (at least attempted) my knowledge, beliete my M It or not you really don't want IT. to super Urs (world of tank and healer)
FLoor 819, i look around the corner to see what the stairs are like and notice that they are like this
Floor 820: You suddenly get invoked with a strange virus, anything could happen to you within 5 floors.
Floor 821: The virus has reverted you back to a crawling baby in diapers. You crawl up the stairs to the next floor.
Floor 822: The virus ages you into an old man in a diaper. You limp without a cane to the next floor.
Floor 823: This floor was designed by M. C. Esher. Spend an hour walking along walls before continuing.
floor 824: just one more until the next
Floor 825: you're finally here. It's just another generic, uninteresting floor. You weep sadly.
Floor 826: Advertisements for extreme bungee jumping are on every wall.
Floor 827: The virus has reverted you back to a regular person.
Floor 828: The virus has left you entirely.
Floor 829: iPhone or Android?
floor 830: the floor is gone and you feel a sudden urge to jump
